General.Name: ioneer Ltd American Depositary Shares
General.Description: ioneer Ltd explores for and develops mineral properties in North America. Its flagship property is the Rhyolite Ridge lithium-boron project located in the state of Nevada, the United States. The company was formerly known as Global Geoscience Limited and changed its name to ioneer Ltd in November 2018. ioneer Ltd was incorporated in 2001 and is based in North Sydney, Australia.
General.Address: 140 Arthur Street, North Sydney, NSW, Australia, 2060
